trans-unit.source: The event occurs whenever the user clicks on a button on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre sempre que o usuário clica em um botão em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> wiith the information about the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>propriedade contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>wiith as informações sobre o botão foi clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property is set equal to the `button` parameter.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"></xref> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton"> </xref> que foi clicado.

trans-unit.source: The Button property is initially set equal to the `button` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do botão é inicialmente definida como o `button` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>
